comment: summer class is just textbook quizzes (unlimited time, no lockdown) and discussion boards with a 500 word reflective essay at the end. This is basically a generic health class, dont expect to learn any actual contemporary health issues. Dr. Hall does not mess around with rubrics though. Don't slip them up.

I believe if you follow instructions and have a good stable group, you can pass this class! She has weekly quizzes and you do assignments to prepare for a photo voice project in which you present at the end. Though she is a very tough grader and nit picks at any minor mistake.

I'm a high-achieving student, so it was discouraging to receive a D on our very first written assignment- especially considering I followed the prompt. It often feels like there's little room for interpretation or creativity, and when student responses don't match her exact expectations, her response is usually harsh or dismissive. Find a diff prof

Just like in nature, where vibrant colors warn of danger, this professor will poison your GPA if you're not in a strong group. She gives minimal guidance, barely teaches, and delays feedback for weeks. Group work is her way of doing less. Avoid if you care about your grade.

Professor Hall is very tough grader that does not allow any late work what so ever! She doesn't respond to emails and she does have a very condescending attitude that makes you not want to ask questions. Do not slip up and miss any assignments!

This professor has terrible grading criteria. She has an extremely condescending tone, and gives the most meaningless assignments I have every had in college. I took this class as my last senior elective and I regret it every day. The group project is a waste of time and frustrating if you have a horrible group. Will mess up your GPA.

Dr. Hall is really a great professor. Her class is only made up of 350 points, so do your work! She is really big on class participation so make sure to actually look at her content before class. There is a group project that is worked on throughout the semester but its really clear. Its genuinely impossible to fail if you show up and participate.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--Group projects

comment: Honestly Dr. Hall may seem tough but she is a great professor. She is big on in class participation, so be ready to actually interact with her about the assignments and readings she provides. She is very clear on assignment guidelines and but can be a bit tough on grading. This class is only out of 350 points, do your work and you will be fine.

I've never written a review before but I had to clear her low rating. Dr. Hall might seem harsh and straightforward at first, but she acts out of tough love. Attendance is mandatory but you can have two unexcused absences. She values participation so if you do the readings and answer questions, you'll be good to go I promise.

Nothing says "I disrespect my students" quite like making us waste gas money sitting in traffic to take photos. Thanks for burning through multiple of my tanks while I sat in gridlock for three hours. Next time, maybe pick a project that doesn't require crossing three highways during rush hour! because you needed them taken during the day
Do yourself a favor and take an elective to cover this course. The group project and lack of response from the professor will kill your GPA.

Attendance is mandatory and there's a big group presentation you'll be working on half of the semester. There is also weekly quizzes that are based on the readings. Her lectures can be uncomfortable at times. Her attitude can come off as grumpy at times. While her teaching style could be worked on more, the material was interesting and relevant.

This is for IHS 3260! Dr.Hall has the potential to be a great prof. but her demeanor and attitude comes off as rude and condescending!  Main assignments are based on a group project. However, she grades very toughly on every little thing and gives little explanation of what she is expecting beforehand. Very hard to get a decent grade on anything.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Get ready to read--Group projects

comment: Your whole grade is based off quizzes and a group project which I hated, no extra credit.But she does allow you to fix mistakes to gain points back. Attitude is very judgmental and asks the most unknown questions and catches an attitude if no one knows the answer. She had her good days, but the bad ones overpowered.If ur 15 min late, you are absent

Professor Hall is the worst professor I have had in my entire college career. She is the most judgmental and condescending person I have ever met. Her class should be way easier than she makes it. It is a total waste of time and her character makes it an even worse experience. Do not take this professor.

Dr. Hall grades SO hard but she does give feedback and allows you to apply the feedback to earn points.Her work is group setting based which is nice. No tests or finals just assignments and a little bit of outside reading. Lecture is mandatory and she takes five points off your grade for every unaccused absence.

I am an A/B student and I have NEVER had a professor like this before. Anytime a person asks a question in class she makes you feel stupid and never actually answers questions. EX: she gave us a citation assignment and a citation generator to use... I got a 65 on the assignment, using the website she told us to and filling it out completely.
She is a Great teacher. You must follow directions. Love her in class group work.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--Amazing lectures

comment: Do NOT take this professor. She gives terrible grades and feedback and this is coming from someone whose never gotten below a B.
Shes a VERY tough grader and does not care if you pass. She makes this class harder than what it needs to be.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--Participation matters

comment: DO NOT TAKE HER! She will make you feel dumb for asking questions. Very tough grader! Does not care if you pass.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Lecture heavy--Tough grader

comment: Love her! Defiantly the best professor for capstone!!
